ygData.subject: Re: Group or Solo
ygData.msgSnippet: I m not as well travelled as you, server-speaking, but I am in a guild. Our guild seems rather friendly when it comes to having non-guild members group with us
ygData.messageBody:
I'm not as well travelled as you, server-speaking, but I am in a guild.
Our guild seems rather friendly when it comes to having non-guild members
group with us (on The Rathe). I know there are lots of jerk-guilds out
there, but one thing you might try doing is asking a guild group that you
see if they can use you. Chances are there's at least one bright person in
the group that knows the benefits of having a bard.


> From: scott@... (scott brisko)
>
> I have noticied that there are far fewer people of a comparable level, and
> that many of the players belong to guilds of various natures. Perhaps this
> is a consequence of playing on a more established server where players
have
> had more time to develop their characters.
